Package be.brahms.rent_serve.services.impl

Class MaterialServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
be.brahms.rent_serve.services.impl.MaterialServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MaterialService
@Service public class MaterialServiceImpl extends Object implements MaterialService
Service implementation for managing material. Uses MaterialRepository to perform database operations.
